function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Political approaches to sustainability","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Short-term survival strategies supporting business-as-usual","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global economy predicted to shrink by 6% in 2020 with 300 million job losses","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant variance in economic impacts across sectors and countries","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic as a global health crisis","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of public awareness and political implication in disease prevention","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on scientific evidence without public awareness and political commitment","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health inequities derived from urban development","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for single-family houses due to pandemic","category":"Family","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging individual transportation over public transport","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased vulnerability and higher fatality rates associated with contagious diseases","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inevitability of another influenza pandemic","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on public health in urban development","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of plagues on population","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global recession due to pandemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Preprint research may contain unverified information and methodologies, potentially influencing public health decisions and actions.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to comply with social distancing and hygiene measures.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with social distancing and containment measures","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of public awareness and education regarding disease prevention measures","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of coronavirus due to non-compliance with social distancing measures and stay-at-home guidelines.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in fear of the virus leading to reduced compliance with measures","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing costs of compliance losing income or jobs leading to reduced capacity to comply","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lower self-control leading to non-compliance with lockdown measures.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Trust in government and leaders influencing compliance","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impulsivity associated with noncompliance","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No strict enforcement of covid-19 mitigation measures in the netherlands.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to comply with measures due to lack of resources or knowledge.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No relation between costs of compliance and compliant behavior","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No relation between negative emotions and compliance","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No relation for severity of deterrence with compliance","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prediction that greater costs of compliance would predict less compliance","category":"Person","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Publication
